name: Hole of Humanity
description: Thousands of years in the future, an alien race find the remnants of our planet Earth. As their scientists and archeologists seek to explore and understand our culture, technology and history, they need to fill in the gaps with their assumptions about the human race.  They seek to understand our reasons for deforestation, pollution and man-made global warming. This VR experience was made to explore the nature of context within storytelling.
